title: 1. Set your goals
content: Customise your savings goal. Choose how much and how long you want to save for, how frequently, in which currency and your risk appetite.

title: 2. Get added to a pool
content: We match you with savers using the same timeframe. Joining a saving pool together for a fixed length of time.

title: 3. Deposit
content: Make regular deposits. Watch your savings grow. Whilst saving, you are free to withdraw your principal at any point.

title: 4. Save regularly
content: However, if you miss a payment you forfeit your chance to claim a slice of the  interest generated.

title: 5. Cash out!
content: At the end of your poolâ€™s timeframe, we calculate the number of successful regular savers. Interest generated over this time is split between all winners. Everyone else only gets their principal back.

title: 6. Higher returns
content: Successful savers enjoy their hard won, higher interest returns. The more people drop out, the greater the returns.

title: Optionally: add ETH
content: Want to grow some ETH as well as stable tokens? Select this option to convert a percentage of each of your deposits to ETH. This is withdrawable at any point and does not affect your ability to claim interest.
